issues.description: The problem specification defines StockIngredient.price as an int (and its constructor signature as StockIngredient(String, int, int)), but the template class declares price as a double (with constructor StockIngredient(String, double, int)), while the solution switches to int. This mismatch in the price attribute type and constructor parameter will confuse students about which type to use and lead to compilation or casting issues when implementing calculateTotalPrice.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the template StockIngredient.price field and its constructor parameter from double to int (and have getPrice() return int) so it matches the specification and the solution.
